title: Pocketbook, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk, gold-wrapped silk, gold-wrapped linen
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, surface satin and couching stitches
description: White silk plain weave embroidered with flower and leaf design. Bag edged with woven silk and flat metal tape. Design the same on front and back. In pink, light blue, dark blue, green, yellow, and brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Pocketbook, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: silk, gold-wrapped silk, gold-wrapped linen
Technique: embroidered in stem, satin, surface satin and couching stitches. Bequest of Marian Hague. 1971-50-112.
